MENU_ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
MENU_ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Our team is passionate about programming and dedicated to creating an exceptional experience for our users. My Big Whale has been built with utmost care and expertise using Java and JavaScript languages. These technologies have enabled us to create an innovative and powerful platform for image and document manipulation. Our goal is to provide editing tools that blend ease of use with professional results, offering our users a unique and productive experience. We are constantly striving to enhance and expand My Big Whale, ensuring it is the ideal choice to boost the creativity and success of our customers.

MENU_LOGO.DESCRIPTION: Your palette of features to enhance images and manipulate documents.

CARD.Você pode facilmente retirar o plano de: You can easily remove the unwanted background and get images with transparency.
CARD.Para extrair automaticamente as cores pr: To automatically extract the main colors from your image and get inspiration for your design projects.
CARD.Você pode criar certificados personaliza: You can create custom certificates quickly and easily for recognition and authentication.
CARD.Converta imagens em vários formatos de f: Convert images to various formats quickly and conveniently.
CARD.Converta facilmente um arquivo .ZIP em o: Easily convert a .ZIP file to another compression format of your choice!
CARD.Proteja seu arquivo criptografando e des: Protect your file by encrypting and decrypting it with a key that only you know.
CARD.Você pode gerar um QR-CODE personalizado: You can generate a custom QR code with ease.

cryptograph.title: Enhance the security of your files
cryptograph.description: Use a strong encryption key to protect your document or, if you want to decrypt the document, use the correct key generated on our site to access its original content with greater security.
